TopicTitle: REPLICA: NEW YF-12A Version 2 By Eorin 1.0

Articles.Content:
YF-12A v2

![cLEJXjE.png](http://i.imgur.com/cLEJXjE.png)

Beautifull render done by Esinohio [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93628-Esinohio-s-Blender-farm)

Hi guys! This is a total rebuild from 0 of my favourite plane the YF-12A (blackbird's less known big brother [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lockheed_YF-12) the story if you are interested)

This new replica has 133 parts against the 220 of the old model, this means a lot less lag and lot more manouverability, speed and fun in general.

It is even better looking than the old model and more realistic, this is really the best i can do with stock parts.

I can't really tell you how much hours i have spent on the old replica, probably 48h or something similar trying to reach the perfect shape and form, this new instead comes like magic in only 8 hours like if every stock piece i placed was really in the right place, well almost XD yes almost because i have spent hours finding the right shape of the nose section and these are the results:

![De0tz49.png](http://i.imgur.com/De0tz49.png)

![oQ0DyQE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oQ0DyQE.jpg)

![soM1pUE.png](http://i.imgur.com/soM1pUE.png)

As you can see the shape is perfect and i'm really proud of this.

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe> 

DECTAILS

-Parts 133

-fuel load: more than 1000lt standard (max > 2000lt)

-sea level speed: about mach 1 at sea level (depens on fuel load)

-max speed: about mach 3.4 at 11/12km altitude

-max altitude: about 20km

-manouverability: outstanding

CONTROLS

-1 toggle engines

-2 toggle nacelles

-4 toggle missile bay

-brake toggle rudders air brakes 

WARNING 

Before take off click "control from here" on the probodobodyne clipped inside the nose as shown here

![N3B5PsT.png](http://i.imgur.com/N3B5PsT.png)

[DOWNLOAD CRAFT](http://www./download/ad2qa8gduq8fmls/YF-12A_V2_By_Eorin_1_0.craft)

The craft comes coloured with kerbpaint, but if you don't have it it's not a problem, the craft will still work

\*\*\*\*\* the craft is modificable if you want and usable on youtube too, just remember to credit me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)\*\*\*\*\*

Kerbapaint download (latest version updated by me) ALL CREDITS GOES TO KERBPAINT CREATOR: [Texel](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/84670-Texel) (thanks for your work on this must have plugin)

[DOWNLOAD KERBPAINT](http://www./download/xn3yjuo8drk59nq/KerbPaint.zip)

If you like my creations please click the rep button and comment, i spend a lot of hours on my replicas so these kind of stuffs are really apreciated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T21:53:06Z" title="08/13/2015 09:53  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by eorin**

> 
> thanks for the paint mod

Np, it was really a thing i needed to do for the yf-12a, a blackbird needs to be Black ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
How you did this in 120 parts is really beyond me.

> 
> How you did this in 120 parts is really beyond me.

I just used only big wings and very few control surfaces and strut connectors mostly.

Patch 1.03 and still this craft is working, to be honest it works even better now! max sea level speed increased from 950 km/h to 1000 km/h.

Plus it looks better now with afterburner effects.

![YbXavJ8.png](http://i.imgur.com/YbXavJ8.png)

A lot of awesome crafts were released in these last 2 months, but i still think my YF-12 can fly over them or at least side by side.

UPDATE: resolved most of the Z fighting, now in the hangar it looks better. A bit more fuel loaded for a better stability on the runway. DOWNLOAD at the same link on the main thread.

![CT7i5Km.png](http://i.imgur.com/CT7i5Km.png)

And here it is 3D view of the craft without paintjob

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

[YF-12A V2 By Eorin 1_0](https://sketchfab.com/models/f4f04887a46248ddaafee319132cb94d) by [eorin](https://sketchfab.com/eorin) on [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com)

Check this awesome render done by [Esinohio](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93628-Esinohio-s-Blender-farm)! 

![cLEJXjE.png](http://i.imgur.com/cLEJXjE.png)
She is a beauty, and a beast at the same time. Great work!

> 
> She is a beauty, and a beast at the same time. Great work!

Thanks man i apreciate =)

> 
> Best one yet, by far

Well there aren't so much YF-12 on this forum to be honest ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) so there is not a real competition. If you talk about blackbirds in general it's another deal =)

> 
> Well there aren't so much YF-12 on this forum to be honest ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) so there is not a real competition. If you talk about blackbirds in general it's another deal =)

I guess I meant blackbirds in general. I haven't seen a better one. Yours looks simple and all the clipping is hidden, which I'm all about.

The turbine with the tail through it is super clever. And I like how you clipped the flaps, I'll have to try that

MAJOR UPDATE

changed a bit the wing shape to respect more the real airplane design, the front section is now a bit longer and the wing/tail section now is sligtly shorter.

new comparison availabe
